name: Shepherd And His Sheep
description:
A game made by me for GMTK Game Jam 2020!
Theme: Out of Control

Story
You are a shepherd , trying hard to make a living. You need to raise 10 sheep so that you can make enough money to pay the rent.
Just a shepherd with his sheep, what could go wrong?

Win condition
Make 10 sheep

Keyboard control
WASD: move
J (when close to sheep): feed the sheep
K (when close to sheep / wood): pick up / drop object

Credit
I thank all the creators from freesound and opengameart for making this possible. Please approach me if I miss your credit!

Have fun and enjoy!!
(Spoil Alert!!!!!!!!!!!! Don't scroll down if you haven't played the game yet!)

The shepherd is secretly a werewolf . At night, he will lose control and start eating sheep!

Werewolf control
J: Roarrrrrrrrrrrrr
